body.p: Sir I want to inform you The whereabouts of the 1st Battallion of 73, E, M,, and its Condition
I have Elected Major & four Captains According to Law & order
I have to inform you that the Wickliff Men are about to seceed from order & Swear vengence against your order & Say they will go to Jail before they will Muster under Lincolnits
I ask you as my Commander to give me the power to force them to obey the Orders that is Required of them
I ask you to attest the fine not les than $5.00 nor over $25.00

Yours Respectfully
Lieut, Col. R, A, Thomas
P. S I have ordered a company muster the 3 Saturday in this month

Ky State Militia
Mt Sterling-- Montgomery Co
April, 4, 1864
Thomas R. A,
Lt Col 73rd E M
Has formed one Battalion and ordered Drills & Musters
